full_summary:
Tender Title
---------------

NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP) for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)

### Description of Work
The Sexual Misconduct Support and Resource Centre requires a System Analyst to support system engineering activities for the Confide & Help Confide applications. This involves the creation and maintenance of workflow, process, and data flow diagrams, understanding and mapping the system as it is developed, attending technical meetings, and creating all required deliverables in visual and written format.

### Security Requirements

*   The Contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) at all times during the performance of the Contract.
*   The Contractor personnel requiring access to PROTECTED information, assets, or sensitive site(s) must hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS.
*   The Contractor must have Document Safeguarding Capability at the level of PROTECTED B, issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

### Tender Specifications

| **Characteristic**                       | **Description**                                                 |
| ----------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Tender Type**                           | Request for Proposal (RFP)                                        |
| **Procurement Method**                    | Competitive, Open Bidding                                            |
| **Selection Criteria**                    | Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price                 |
| **Language**                               | English (with the option of French)                                |
| **Tender Documents**                      | Available on Canadabuys.gcc.ca                                       |
| **Tender Submission Deadline**             | 2023-12-11T15:00:00 (Eastern Time)                                |
| **Contracting Authority**                  | Samantha Coles (Samantha.Coles@forces.gc.ca)                       |

### Additional Requirements
Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply.

Información Addicional
--------------------

Cette entreprise est exonérée du démantèlement en raison d'une demande spécifique existsis a été formulée par un organismes en rapport avec l'adoption d'un systéme de memoire.
